short_description: Learn Django ORM and database relationships and REST API fundamentals.
description: This course focuses on real-world backend development using Django ORM and API concepts. Learn data modeling and query optimization.

programs_included: Django REST Framework Deep Dive|Authentication & Permissions|Query Optimization Techniques|Caching & Throttling|Logging & Debugging APIs

short_description: A complete roadmap from beginner to job-ready backend developer.
